data.description:
When you create this symbol, choose a damage type: air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light, or poison. The creature bearing this symbol gains Resistance to the chosen damage type.

  • You: @LOSS[2 ip]

  • Target: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.3tMyw1mCjd7SfGTD]{Air Resistance} @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.QrEztsujMpK33cpj]{Bolt Resistance} @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.fBbLvII5LUEqInQQ]{Dark Resistance} @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.H3SJ1fej3GSyHdKG]{Earth Resistance} @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.FAfKTXxluiqIVP5t]{Fire Resistance} @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.SWdZeuJTEq1ig6S8]{Ice Resistance} @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.Xab6AwcRhoxVhygu]{Light Resistance} @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.Item.3xPA7x9S3fggYHkX]{Poison Resistance}

effects.name: Symbol of Protection
effects.description:
When you create this symbol, choose a damage type: air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light, or poison. The creature bearing this symbol gains Resistance to the chosen damage type.
